p: Positive control (only lead acetate treated) group showed highly significant (P < 0.001) increase in serum creatinine, urea, uric acid and extremely significant (P < 0.001) reduction in albumin levels compared to negative control. Treatment groups such as EA 50, EA 25 witnessed highly significant (P < 0.001) restoration of serum biomarkers levels ( TableÂ 1).
